last_episode_to_air.name: Clan of the Cave Goof
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the last episode, Goofy tells Max about his cavemen ancestors how important regular dental checkups are.

name: Goof Troop
overview: Goofy is a single father raising his son, Max in Spoonerville. As it happens, Goofy and Max end up moving in next door to Goofy's high school friend Pete and his family. Pete's son PJ and Max become best friends practically doing everything together.

episodes.name: Everything's Coming Up Goofy
episodes.overview: Goofy moves to Spoonerville with Max -- and next door to old pal Petey.

episodes.name: Good Neighbor Goofy
episodes.overview: P.J. and Max, prohibited by their dads from hanging out with each other, finds a way to get them to make up so everyone can be happy.

episodes.name: Axed by Addition
episodes.overview: P.J. afraid of getting grounded big time by his dad for a bad report card, so he has fun like it's his last day on Earth.

episodes.name: Unreal Estate
episodes.overview: Pete hires Goofy as a handyman for his getaway cottage.

episodes.name: You Camp Take It with You
episodes.overview: Pete and Goofy take the boys on a eventful camping trip.

episodes.name: Midnight Movie Madness
episodes.overview: The kids think that a killer is on the loose after seeing a scary movie.

episodes.name: Counterfeit Goof
episodes.overview: A simple job as hanging up wallpaper puts Goofy in trouble with counterfeiters.

episodes.name: O, R-V, I N-V U
episodes.overview: RVs are on Pete's mind when he gets Max to create one for him.

episodes.name: Meanwhile, Back at the Ramp
episodes.overview: Goofy tries to impress Max by jumping a very dangerous skateboard ramp.

episodes.name: Close Encounters of the Weird Mime
episodes.overview: It's an alien invasion! Not really, but a messed up science project seems to make people think that.

episodes.name: Slightly Dinghy
episodes.overview: Max wants to find a sunken treasure.

episodes.name: Cabana Fever
episodes.overview: Pete gets away from it all to a deserted island, where his joy is marred when Goofy shows up.

episodes.name: Where There's Smoke, There's Goof
episodes.overview: Goofy is the town's new fireman, god help Spoonerville.

episodes.name: Date with Destiny
episodes.overview: When Max says Goofy's getting married (to avoid an awkward moment at school), Peg sets out to find Goofy the ideal match.

episodes.name: Hot Air
episodes.overview: Pistol wants to fly at an air show.

episodes.name: Take Me out of the Ball Game
episodes.overview: Pete and Goofy get into it about their boys on the baseball team, much to the boys' dismay.

episodes.name: Wrecks, Lies & Videotape
episodes.overview: Max tapes Goofy for the TV show ""America's Most Painful Home Videos"" to win a prize, but Pete steals the tape to win the prize himself.

episodes.name: Max-imum Protection
episodes.overview: A burglar prompts Pete to get Goofy to buy a security system.

episodes.name: Goofin' Hood & His Melancholy Men
episodes.overview: To get Max interested in history, Goofy tells him a story about one of his many ancestors in his family.

episodes.name: Leader of the Pack
episodes.overview: A gang tries to takes over the popular hangout, and Max, PJ and his cousin Debbie tries his best to stop them.

episodes.name: Inspector Goofy
episodes.overview: Pete gets Goofy a job as a city inspector, but regrets it when Goofy inspects his business.

episodes.name: Shake, Rattle & Goof
episodes.overview: Max and PJ got a rock band going on, and Goofy joins in- with a Ukelele?!

episodes.name: Terminal Pete
episodes.overview: Pete thinks that he is going to die and makes immediate plans.

episodes.name: Fool's Gold
episodes.overview: Goofy and Pete get into it over found gold.

episodes.name: Cat's Entertainment
episodes.overview: Pete puts Goofy's cat in commercials.

episodes.name: Waste Makes Haste
episodes.overview: Goofy and Pete's recycling project gets serious when a millionaire's valuable is in with the recyclables.

episodes.name: The Ungoofables
episodes.overview: Goofy tells about his G-man ancestor, Elliot Goof.

episodes.name: All the Goof That's Fit to Print
episodes.overview: Pete starts his own newspaper to get business for his car dealership.

episodes.name: To Heir Is Human
episodes.overview: Pete puts PJ to work at this car lot.

episodes.name: Hallow-Weenies
episodes.overview: Pete acquires an old, haunted mansion -- haunted by a trio of ghostly musicians.

episodes.name: Tub Be or Not Tub Be
episodes.overview: A bathtub race pits PJ and Pete together.

episodes.name: Major Goof
episodes.overview: Pete's jokes are always causing trouble. This time, it gets Goofy, Max and PJ chosen for a secret mission.

episodes.name: A Goof of the People
episodes.overview: Goofy runs for mayor when pollution becomes a problem in Spoonerville.

episodes.name: Goof Under My Roof
episodes.overview: Pete seems to own half of Goofy's property, so he uses that fact to lord over Goofy.

episodes.name: Goodbye Mr. Goofy
episodes.overview: One of Pete's plan might cost Goofy his beloved home.

episodes.name: Lethal Goofin'
episodes.overview: Bullies beware! Max and PJ, new School Safety Patrolmen, are on the prowl.

episodes.name: Frankengoof
episodes.overview: Goofy inherits the scary Frankengoof castle...and a monster to boot.

episodes.name: E=MC Goof
episodes.overview: Goofy? A rocket scientist? No way, there must be some mix-up somewhere.

episodes.name: Pete's Day at the Races
episodes.overview: Pete tries to sell a race horse.

episodes.name: In Goof We Trust
episodes.overview: Goofy's the honest man in Spoonerville, and Pete uses Goof's quality to drum up business at his lot.

episodes.name: And Baby Makes Three
episodes.overview: Fearing that a new arrival to Pete's family will get them iced out, PJ, Pistol and Max give Pete a ""baby"" he'll never forget.

episodes.name: The Incredible Bulk
episodes.overview: Pete puts Goofy's life at risk when he puts him in a wrestling match with Bulk Brogan, a wrestling champ.

episodes.name: Mrs. Spoonerville
episodes.overview: Slobbish Pete plays Mr. Clean in order to win a house cleaning contest.

episodes.name: For Pete's Sake
episodes.overview: Pete thinks that someone's got a hit on him.

episodes.name: Big City Blues
episodes.overview: Max and P.J. forget all their troubles and cares and go Downtown, where things are not great for their dads who go off searching for them.

episodes.name: Rally Round the Goof
episodes.overview: Pete wants Goofy to be his good luck charm in a road race.

episodes.name: Window Pains
episodes.overview: Peg's new window washing job causes a stupid battle between her and Pete over who makes the most money.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Goof Street
episodes.overview: Con artists takes Pete's house for a remodelling scheme.

episodes.name: Where There's a Will, There's a Goof
episodes.overview: Pete and Goofy play brothers to get an inheritance.

episodes.name: Winter Blunderland
episodes.overview: Pete gets Goofy to play Bigfoot to bring business to his car lot, but it brings along the real Bigfoot instead.

episodes.name: Gymnauseum
episodes.overview: Pete starts the exercise kick when he think he's going to lose his beloved Peg.

episodes.name: Come Fly with Me
episodes.overview: When Pete gets zapped by his computer, he turns into a fly.

episodes.name: As Goof Would Have It
episodes.overview: Pete tricks a diet food company by using a picture of Goofy to display himself. Will he pull it off? Maybe....not.

episodes.name: Calling All Goofs
episodes.overview: When Goofy can't afford to go to Tierra del Fungo for his family reunion, Peg decides to bring the reunion to him.

episodes.name: Buddy Building
episodes.overview: A new kid in town threatens Max and P.J.'s friendship with each other.

episodes.name: Dr. Horatio's Magic Orchestra
episodes.overview: Pete buys a mechanical band that plays a song he hates!

episodes.name: Goofs of a Feather
episodes.overview: When Pete kills a duck while hunting, the duck family take up residence in his house.

episodes.name: Goof Fellas
episodes.overview: Goofy and Pete, witnesses to an attempted murder, are placed in Witness Protection, but Goofy does not seem to comply with the rules.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad & the Goofy
episodes.overview: The police think that Pete is a hard-to-catch burglar, thanks to Goofy.

episodes.name: Educating Goofy
episodes.overview: Goofy's going back to school to finish what he began.

episodes.name: Peg o' the Jungle
episodes.overview: Goofy teaches Pete to be a man with sensitivity.

episodes.name: Partners in Grime
episodes.overview: Pete and Goof are partners in a ctaering business.

episodes.name: A Pizza the Action
episodes.overview: Goofy takes a failing pizza franchise, thanks to Pete.

episodes.name: To Catch a Goof
episodes.overview: Pete goes on a diet, Goofy works on his ninja training techniques, and a burglar is roaming around town. What do these three scenarios have in common? That's up to the families and the police to decide.

episodes.name: Gunfight at the Okie-Doke Corral
episodes.overview: Goofy tells about his cowboy ancestor, Mopalong Goofy.

episodes.name: Queasy Rider
episodes.overview: Max's exciting ride on Goofy's old motorcyle takes a turn for the worst when he encounters some mean biker dudes.

episodes.name: Maximum Insecurity
episodes.overview: Max and PJ teaches Leech a lesson about Stealing. If Max and PJ do not clear themselves of being framed for stealing, they will be sent up the creek.

episodes.name: Puppy Love
episodes.overview: Max wants to impress a new girl in school.

episodes.name: Great Egg-Spectations
episodes.overview: Talk about your Jurassic Park situation! Max finds an egg and it hatches into a baby dinosaur!

episodes.name: Three Ring Bind
episodes.overview: Pistol plays born free with a bad circus's animals.

episodes.name: Pistolgeist
episodes.overview: The boys try to save Pistol from a haunted book.

episodes.name: Bringin' On the Rain
episodes.overview: A drought hits, and Pete does anything to get water to his garden, even if he has to steal it from Goofy.

episodes.name: Talent to the Max
episodes.overview: PJ cannot tell Max that his magic act is not up to snuff.

episodes.name: Tee for Two
episodes.overview: It's Peg vs. Pete when she wants to save a minature golf course he wants to tear down.

episodes.name: Goofin' Up the Social Ladder
episodes.overview: Peg tries to unload some high class real estate, and the Gang helps her out.

episodes.name: Sherlock Goof
episodes.overview: Let's go off to Jolly old England with another one of Goofy's ancestors, a detective named Sherlock Goof.

episodes.name: From Air to Eternity
episodes.overview: P.J. is afraid of heights, and he's afraid to tell his dad.

episodes.name: Clan of the Cave Goof
episodes.overview: In the last episode, Goofy tells Max about his cavemen ancestors how important regular dental checkups are.
